sourcesContent:
import { StyledForm } from "./Form.js" import { Formik, Form as FormikForm, Field, ErrorMessage } from "formik" import { object, string, number, date, InferType } from "yup" const validationSchema = object({ name: string().required("Name is required"), email: string().required("Email is required").email("Email is invalid"), phone: number("Phone must be a number") .required("Phone is required") .positive("Phone is invalid") .min(11, "Phone must contain at least 12 numbers") .max(13, "Phone must contain at least 12 numbers"), }) export default function Form() { return ( { console.log(values) resetForm() }} validationSchema={validationSchema} >
) }
